mapper.sql: id, available, name, order_num, permission, type, url, parent_id
mapper.select: SELECT sys_resource.id as id, sys_resource.available as available, sys_resource.`name` as name , sys_resource.permission as permission, sys_resource.order_num as order_num, sys_resource.type as type, sys_resource.url as url, sys_resource.parent_id as parent_id FROM sys_resource where id = #{id}

SELECT sys_resource.id as id, sys_resource.available as available, sys_resource.`name` as name , sys_resource.permission as permission, sys_resource.order_num as order_num, sys_resource.type as type, sys_resource.url as url, sys_resource.parent_id as parent_id FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_roles ON sys_user.id = sys_user_roles.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_user_roles.roles_id = sys_role.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_resources ON sys_role.id = sys_role_resources.sys_role_id LEFT JOIN sys_resource ON sys_role_resources.resources_id = sys_resource.id where sys_user.username = #{userName} order by sys_resource.order_num asc

SELECT sys_resource.id as id, sys_resource.available as available, sys_resource.`name` as name , sys_resource.permission as permission, sys_resource.order_num as order_num, sys_resource.type as type, sys_resource.url as url, sys_resource.parent_id as parent_id FROM sys_role_resources LEFT JOIN sys_resource ON sys_role_resources.resources_id = sys_resource.id where sys_role_id = #{roleId}
